abilities.name: Stages of Evolution
abilities.effect: As long as Wobbuffet is an Evolved Pokémon, your opponent pays Colorless more to retreat his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grind
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Wobbuffet.

attacks.name: Shadow Tag
attacks.effect: Put 7 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon at the end of your opponent's next turn.
